title: Designing Personalized Online Language Learning Environments for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Requires customized content reflecting learners' specialized fields (medicine, law, engineering, etc.) and language learning objectives

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute personalized language learning plans in an LMS-based asynchronous environment within six weeks.
Learners can improve job application skills by completing over 80% of real-life language tasks linked to their professional fields.
Learners can complete project-based assessment tasks (portfolios) through peer feedback and instructor coaching.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
